thesis: Mean reversion strategy on SPY using Z-scores. Long when Z < -1 and SMA > LMA (uptrend). Short when Z > 1 and SMA < LMA (downtrend). Exit when |Z| < 0.5.
supporting_notes: you can read the whole thing to understand - lets do days as the time horizon, for backtest i don't have a CSV and assume standard OHLCV. the thesis is in the ipynb.
